name: 武具品質
note:
<prefixSuffixNoNameSpace><book:no>
<prefixSuffixName: >
<Prefix Suffix Effect>
var atkBonus = 0
if(Math.floor(Math.random() * 100)<$gameVariables.value(166)){
var p = $gameVariables.value(149);
var pp = p;
do {
if($gameSwitches.value(349)){
atkBonus = Math.floor(Math.random() * p)
console.log(atkBonus)
}else{
atkBonus = Math.floor(Math.random() * p) - Math.floor(Math.random() * p/3);
}
if(atkBonus==0) atkBonus = 1;
var dd = Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)+2
if(dd==3)dd=2;
newItem.params[dd] += atkBonus;
p-=atkBonus
} while (p > 0);
}

atkBonus = pp
if(atkBonus&&atkBonus>0){
newItem.name += " +" + atkBonus;
newItem.price += atkBonus*100;
}
if(atkBonus&&atkBonus<0){
newItem.name += " +" + atkBonus;
}
</Prefix Suffix Effect>
